pages.text: The Ender Scrambler when placed in the world will prevent Enderman from teleporting.$(br2)The Scrambler is controlled with the Ender Scrambler Configurator!
Used to prevent ender man from teleporting.
Right click in main hand to increase range.$(br2)Shift right click in main hand to decrease range.$(br2)Right click in off hand to toggle between on and off!
Used to control the Ender Scrambler!
